function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Finger contact with virus-contaminated surfaces (fomites) and subsequent contact with facial membranes","Impact":"Potential for direct transmission of the virus","Mitigation":"Frequent hand washing and sanitation of surfaces","Technologies":"Antiviral surface coatings, UV sterilization","People":"People in close proximity to contaminated surfaces","Owner":"Building managers, cleaning staff"},{"Description":"Inhalation of the virus carried in airborne particles from cough or vocalization","Impact":"Potential for airborne transmission of the virus","Mitigation":"Improved ventilation and air filtration systems","Technologies":"HEPA filters, air purifiers, UV air sanitation systems","People":"People in enclosed spaces with poor ventilation","Owner":"Building managers, architects"},{"Description":"Droplet spray onto facial membranes from cough or vocalization","Impact":"Potential for direct transmission of the virus","Mitigation":"Wearing face masks, maintaining physical distance","Technologies":"High-efficiency masks, face shields","People":"People in close proximity to infected individuals","Owner":"Public health authorities, individuals"}]}
